enb_long_title: Twenty-eighth Sessions of the UNFCCC Subsidiary Bodies, Second Session of the Ad Hoc Working Group Under the Convention, and fifth Session of the Ad Hoc Working Group Under the Kyoto Protocol
sentences: The Secretariat introduced this item ( FCCC/SBI/2008/INF.3/Rev.1 ), and the G-77/CHINA said applying the GEF s Resource Allocation Framework to national communications was not acceptable.
Emily Ojoo-Massawa (Kenya) and Nicole Wilke (Germany) will co-chair a contact group.
